mapper.sql: ID, USER_ID, BANKNAME, ECARD_NO, REALNAME, CERTTYPE, CERT_NO, MOBILE, STATUS, BIND_NO, CARDTYPE, CUSTODY_BIND_NO, CUSTODY_BIND_NAME, ADDTIME
mapper.select: select e.BIND_NO from e_bankinfo e inner join rocky_member m on e.USER_ID=m.id where m.USERNAME=#{userName}
mapper.insert: insert into e_bankinfo (ID, USER_ID, BANKNAME, ECARD_NO, REALNAME, CERTTYPE, CERT_NO, MOBILE, STATUS, BIND_NO, CARDTYPE, CUSTODY_BIND_NO, CUSTODY_BIND_NAME, ADDTIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bankname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ecardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certtype,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{certNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{bindNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardtype,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{custodyBindNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custodyBindName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now())

SELECT last_insert_id() AS id
mapper.update:
update e_bankinfo
BANKNAME = #{bankname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ECARD_NO = #{ecardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REALNAME = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CERTTYPE = #{certtype,jdbcType=TINYINT},
CERT_NO = #{certNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
BIND_NO = #{bindNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CARDTYPE = #{cardtype,jdbcType=TINYINT},
CUSTODY_BIND_NO = #{custodyBindNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTODY_BIND_NAME = #{custodyBindName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDTIME = #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update e_bankinfo set USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BANKNAME = #{bankname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ECARD_NO = #{ecardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REALNAME = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CERTTYPE = #{certtype,jdbcType=TINYINT}, CERT_NO = #{certNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, BIND_NO = #{bindNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CARDTYPE = #{cardtype,jdbcType=TINYINT}, CUSTODY_BIND_NO = #{custodyBindNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTODY_BIND_NAME = #{custodyBindName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDTIME = #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
